message.content:
cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.FL, cs.SE, cs.SC 

The paper deals with termination of term rewriting systems, which is a topic in both logic (cs.LO) and programming languages (cs.PL). The focus on local termination also suggests a connection to formal methods and program verification (cs.SE), while the use of well-founded monotone algebras points to a connection with semantics and category theory (cs.SC). Finally, the application to combinatory logic suggests a connection to formal languages and automata theory (cs.FL).
